'''1.21.5 Pre-release 2''' (known as '''1.21.5-pre2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.5]], released on March 12, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-5-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.21.5 Pre-Release 2|March 12, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|71}}.

*Fixed some other crashes.</onlyinclude>
